Title: Relates to studying the adequacy of applied behavioral analysis provider networks
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to make publicly available on the department of health website a report concerning access to applied behavior analysis for enrolled children diagnosed with autism spectrum disorder.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to studying the adequacy of applied behavioral analysis provider networks
